content: 2 and 3 40 cluster sts you will now begin to decrease round 13 chain 2 half_double_crochet around skipping every 4th st/chain join to chain 2 60 sts round 14 chain 2 half_double_crochet in each st around join to chain 2 60 sts round 15 chain 2 in 3rd loops *half_double_crochet half_double_crochet decrease in the next st repeat from * join chain 2 40 sts round 16 chain 2 half_double_crochet in each st around join to chain 2 40 sts round 17 chain 2 in 3rd loops half_double_crochet decrease around join to chain 2 20 sts round 18 chain 2 half_double_crochet in each st around join to chain 2 20 sts round 19 chain 2 in the 3rd loops half_double_crochet decrease around join to chain 2 10 sts cut the yarn weave yarn tail through remaining sts and cinch the top of the hat closed weave in all ends come say hi on instagram and tag me in a pic of your finished hat https //www instagram com/youvebeenyarned/
